extendedInfo.description: Please buy "AutoKill Task Manager Pro Key" for the pro version (All ads removed)."AutoKill Task Manager" is an app manager tool which can kill running apps to speed up your device and save your device's battery life. It is "Auto Kill" enabled task killer which can help reduce your efforts to kill apps manually.We think it is the best battery saver tool for you on android market. !!!!! IMPORTANT !!!!!Add your important apps to ignore list to avoid to be killed by "AutoKill Task Manager". (MENU -> Ignore List)This app is supported via search. Please note that the following will be added to your device once you download the app â Search icon, bookmark link and browser homepage. You can delete/replace these search points easily. This is a way to make money from this app and giving it to you for free. Thank you for your understanding.

reviews.title: Too much ads
reviews.comment: This has more ads than expectations. Uninstalled immediately. Sorry but you must keep customer annoyance level wihin limit and you fail to do that.
reviews.author: Amit Ruj

reviews.title: Power task manager
reviews.comment: Good
reviews.author: Baliram Sahebrao Sawant

reviews.title: Brought Airpush StartApp and LeadBolt icons
reviews.comment: Uninstalled immediately.  Tired of getting ads and notices pushed on me without disclosure. And what a joy -  the spam notification apps stayed. Thanks for the battery killing bonuses!!
reviews.author: Molly Davenport

reviews.title: Great
reviews.comment: Set one minute interval for auto kill and get a super fast system!! Nice app
reviews.author: Sandip Chakraborty

reviews.comment: Nice
reviews.author: bhuvnesh patel

reviews.title: Great app
reviews.comment: Finds all running apps and allows you to add to ignore list. Simple to use. Would like to see a blacklist that can be set to shutdown apps as soon as they try to load. Have had this app running on my old Archos 101 for months and have decided to purchase it for my HTC Desire HD.., runs without any issues.
reviews.author: Mo afzal

reviews.title: Perfect..
reviews.comment: Sometimes it will stop working but still... Best I\'ve tried for Autokill. Does it often and is strong. It\'s really a 5 star program.  One thing though, ads.   When people say it hits you big time with ads, they aren\'t lying.   Be prepared for it.  I\'ve been through a few things to try to fix it and it appears that the application \'ad away\' is doing the trick for now.   This application was never so bad with the ads as it is now.   It really does it\'s job killing though.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Dude
reviews.comment: Super ha
reviews.author: yuva nath.t

reviews.title: Ok
reviews.comment: Ok
reviews.author: Adrian Darmawan

reviews.title: Sucks Big Time with tons of Junk Notifications
reviews.comment: Got my first Galaxy S3 but kept getting lots of Junk Mail Notifications in my Notification Bar.    Total pain to keep clearing the notification bar of these ads.  Did some research and found an app that identified other apps that generate junk notifications.  The only app it identified was AutoKill Task Manager.  Deleted it and after 2 months of junk, I\'m all clear.  Nothing this app can do is worth the junk notifications.  Uninstall as fast as you can!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Best task killer!
reviews.comment: This thing is great - it kills open apps every time the screen turns off.  You do need to go to the link they provide to kill the airpush ads, though, and this will reduce the ad content to a manageable level (for me - if you still don\'t like the number of ads left, you can get the paid version)  The main thing, though: it has really increased the battery life on my HTC EVO 3D, which other apps have not been able to do.  Get it.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Malware bundled
reviews.comment: In two years of having an android phone, I\'ve never done a review. This app puts ads in your status bar and without your permission puts ad shortcuts on your home screen. I thought tech developers stopped being this heavy handed in the 90s.
reviews.author: Brian Ervin

reviews.title: This is basically ADWARE
reviews.comment: Stay away from this app that is borderline malware. Throws up ad icons on home screen.
reviews.author: Michael Lynch
